channel.title: What should i do?
channel.description:
I'm tired of this...
[b]How to make NPC stand still when attacked even if player is running from combat![/b]
I place NPC in wilderness. Someone comes and tried to kill it, player dies and the npc comes to the respawn place and keeps killing everybody because its aggresive!
Now:
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2r44rrs.jpg[/img]
[b]how can i make so it would be like this?[/b]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/oa7z4g.jpg[/img]

item.title: What should i do?
item.dc:creator: @scriptz scriptz
item.description:

I’m tired of this…
